abstract: Law School Admission Council decides not to oust University of Arizona James E Rogers College of Law for admitting applicants who took more general Graduate Record Exam instead of traditional Law School Admissions Test.
lead_paragraph: The Law School Admission Council refrained from penalizing the James E. Rogers College of Law in Arizona after most of the nation’s law school deans rallied to support the school.

headline.main: Law School That Accepts GRE Scores Can Continue On
headline.print_headline: Law School That Accepts GRE Scores Can Continue On, as Deans Rally Around It

snippet: The Law School Admission Council refrained from penalizing the James E. Rogers College of Law in Arizona after most of the nation’s law school deans rallied to support the school.
